This is an analysis of GP data from  https://nwssp.nhs.wales/ourservices/primary-care-services/general-information/data-and-publications/prescribing-data-extracts/general-practice-prescribing-data-extract/

The input is two files, placed in /data/input:

One is a prescriptions list, by surgery and by BNF code

The other is a surgery list, which includes total_prescribing_patients.
